creating new Customer Type
section.para: To create a new customer type, select the NEW button. The following screen will appear:

tip.para: Create your customer types using a logical, hierarchical structure. This will make it easier to retrieve customer type information in the future.

section.para: When creating a new customer type, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Enter a code number to identify the customer type.
Enter a description to identify the customer type.

Select to enforce the use of a characteristics template for any customer assigned to the specified customer type. If characteristics profiles are used, the full slate of characteristics and corresponding values will be presented in the Characteristics tab of the customer master for every customer assigned to the customer type. If not selected, the template approach will not be usedâ€”and users will have the ability to create ad hoc characteristics for customers.
